title: Liquor commission and board attorney
context: ยง281-11.5 Liquor commission and board attorney. The liquor commission or liquor control adjudication board may hire attorneys to assist it in carrying out its administrative functions under this chapter. The assistance may include providing legal advice and prosecuting and defending legal claims under this chapter or arising in connection with this chapter. [L 1988, c 383, ยง1; am L 1990, c 171, ยง3; am L 1998, c 249, ยง3]
